notes.note:
Session history popup breaks after one usage ([bug 1498854][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1498854

Flickering of (some) sticky elements on Twitter and other websites ([bug 1493742][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1493742

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
title: Firefox for Android 63.0.2 Release
